data.title: Best time to visit Stuttgart: Weather and Temperatures. 5 months to avoid! - Germany
data.meta_description: The climate is unfavourable 5 months out of 12 in Stuttgart. Don't get there the wrong period! Discover the best time to go to have a perfect weather.

When is the best time to go to Stuttgart?

When is the best time to go to Stuttgart? Here's some information to help you in your decision:

The best months for good weather in Stuttgart are May, June, July, August and September

On average, the warmest months are June, July and August

January is the coldest month of the year

The rainiest months are May, June and July

Weather and climate in Stuttgart

Stuttgart enjoys a temperate oceanic climate (with warm summer) in accordance with the Köppen-Geiger classification. The yearly average maximum temperature in Stuttgart is 15°C (ranging from 4°C in january to 25°C in august). Annual rainfall is 1210mm, with a minimum of 67mm in september and a maximum of 159mm in may.

Between the months of january and march the climate is very unfavorable. The temperature rises to 10°C and it rains in march about 74mm.

In april the climate is passable, but still OK. It is for example 15°C as maximum temperature in april.

Between may and june the climate is beautiful. The temperature rises to 23°C and it rains about 34% of the time in june.

In july the climate is correct. At lunchtime, it's 24°C in average and it rains in july about 142mm.

From august to september the climate is good. It is for example 21°C as maximum temperature in september.

In october the climate is correct. It is for example 15°C as maximum temperature in october and it rains about 16% of the time in october.

In november the climate is not good. At lunchtime, it's 9°C in average and you can expect to have 86mm of rainfall/month during this period.

In december the climate is very unfavorable. By early evening, the temperature averages 3°C.

Best time for low prices in Stuttgart

Average prices of hotels in Stuttgart month by month

Generally, November is the month with the lowest hotel prices in Stuttgart. So this is a great time to save on your holiday! In contrast, June is statistically the most expensive month of the year for hotels.

Average price for flights to Stuttgart

A return flight between London and Stuttgart is generally cheaper if you go in january ($ 139 on average): this is the best time for travellers on a tight budget. In contrast, you may end up paying $ 71 more for your airline ticket to Stuttgart if you go in june.

Average price of hiring a car in Stuttgart

On average, it costs $ 44 per day to hire a car in Stuttgart. This price varies by $ 3.3 depending on the month. In june, hiring a car costs an average of $ 42 per 24 hours, so this is the best time to save money! In contrast, the average price in december is $ 46.
